# [Interview #1141: Shadows of Self-Leeds, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1141#1)

#### Jaller

I asked Brandon whether kandra could replicate parshendi carapace

#### Brandon Sanderson

they couldn't.

#### Jaller

whether or not it was to do with the same thing as hair and if that was the reason why,

#### Brandon Sanderson

sort of, yes.

#### Tags

kandra
,

parshendi
